documentContentReferences.name: SoA Reference in Amendment Summary
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from the amendment summary table to the Schedule of Activities, specifically noting a change to a footnote in Table 1.

documentContentReferences.name: Screening Procedures Reference in Amendment Summary
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from the amendment summary table to Section 8, which details procedures for screening-only sites in the US.

documentContentReferences.name: COVID-19 Vaccine Risk Reference
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from Section 2.3.1.1 to Section 10.5 for potential risks and mitigation measures due to COVID-19 vaccine.

documentContentReferences.name: Dose Modification Reference in Risk Table
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from the Potential Risks and Mitigation Strategy table (Table 3) to the dose modification or discontinuation procedures in Section 6.6.

documentContentReferences.name: Adaptive Features Table Reference
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from Section 4.1 to Table 4, which describes the adaptive design features of the study.

documentContentReferences.name: Dose Modification Criteria Table Reference
documentContentReferences.sectionTitle: ALXN1840 Dose Modifications for Individual Participants
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from Section 4.1 to Table 7 for criteria on when a dose should be decreased or interrupted.

documentContentReferences.name: Exclusion Criteria Reference for Blood Donation
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from lifestyle considerations (Table 5) to Section 5.2 regarding restrictions on blood donation prior to screening.

documentContentReferences.name: Contraceptive Guidance Reference
documentContentReferences.sectionTitle: Contraceptive Guidance and Collection of Pregnancy Information
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from lifestyle considerations (Table 5) to Section 10.4 for details on appropriate contraceptive methods.

documentContentReferences.name: Inclusion Criteria Reference for Contraception
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from lifestyle considerations (Table 5) to Section 5.1 for start times of contraceptive methods.

documentContentReferences.name: Discontinuation Procedures Reference
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from Section 7.1 to the SoA for data to be collected at the time of study intervention discontinuation.

documentContentReferences.name: Pregnancy Discontinuation Reference
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from Section 7.1 to Section 8.2.6 regarding pregnancy as a reason for discontinuation from study intervention.

documentContentReferences.name: ECG Withdrawal Criteria Reference
documentContentReferences.sectionTitle: DISCONTINUATION OF STUDY INTERVENTION AND PARTICIPANT DISCONTINUATION/WITHDRAWAL
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from Section 8.2.3 to Section 7 for QTc withdrawal criteria.

documentContentReferences.name: Clinical Lab Tests List Reference
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from Section 8.2.4 to Section 10.2 for the list of clinical laboratory tests to be performed.

documentContentReferences.name: AE/SAE Procedures Reference
documentContentReferences.sectionTitle: Adverse Events: Definitions and Procedures for Recording, Evaluating, Follow-up, and Reporting
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from Section 8.3 to Section 10.3 for procedures on recording, evaluating, and reporting AEs and SAEs.

documentContentReferences.name: Lost to Follow-up Definition Reference
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from Section 8.3.3 to Section 7.3 for the definition of 'lost to follow-up'.

documentContentReferences.name: Genetic Testing Non-use Reference
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from Section 8.3.6 to Section 8.7 to clarify that biobanked samples will not be used for genetic testing.

documentContentReferences.name: Molybdenum Measurement Details Reference
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from Section 8.5 to Section 8.1.1 for details of molybdenum measured in food, drinks, urine, and feces.

documentContentReferences.name: Biomarker Details Reference
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from Section 8.8 to Section 8.6 for details of copper and other biomarkers.

documentContentReferences.name: Analysis Populations Table Reference
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from Section 9.3 to Table 8, which defines the population sets for analysis.

documentContentReferences.name: SoA Reference for PK/PD Sampling
documentContentReferences.description: Reference from Section 8.5 to the SoA (Table 1) for PK/PD sample collection schedule.

commentAnnotations.text: Abbreviations: CRF = case report form; CRU = clinical research unit; EOS = End of Study; SoA = Schedule of Activities.
Abbreviations: ICF = informed consent form; PD = pharmacodynamic; PK = pharmacokinetic.

studyDefinitionDocumentVersions.description: Clarify study procedures in the US to facilitate participant recruitment and lessen inconvenience for participants.
